ComicInfo.Summary:
Enter: The Dragon: Savage Dragon has been brought in by the New York police department to take down Shadowhawk but 'Hawk gets some unexpected assistance from Vendetta's allies who want him to join their criminal enterprise. Shadowhawk refuses.
Opening Shots Part Two: The Others take the surviving soldiers to their city.
ComicInfo.Title: Enter: The Dragon; Opening Shots Part Two
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jim Valentino,Chance Wolf,Phil D'Moss,Jim Valentino,Chance Wolf,Phil D'Moss
